      • addUser

        public java.util.List<User> addUser(java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String password)
        Asks the wrk to create a new user in the database. If it was successfully added (if the result is true) then return the new list to the IHM. Otherwise, return NULL, meaning the list didn't change.
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface ItfCtrlIhm
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to add.
        password - The non-encrypted password of the user to add.
        Returns:
        A list of user if the new user has been added, NULL otherwise.
